description:
'Battle Mage' can be used in DNF Duel.

*This character is also bundled together in the DNF Duel - Season Pass. 
Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.

※ The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to use this content.
※ You may need to apply the latest patch before using this product.
※ There is no Story Mode for the DLC character.
name: DNF Duel - DLC 3: Battle Mage
